Title: Requires the court to hold a settlement conference prior to conducting any further proceedings in any pending residential eviction matter
Summary: Requires the court to hold a settlement conference prior to conducting any further proceedings in any pending residential eviction matter; provides for the repeal of such provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT requiring the court to hold a settlement conference prior to conducting any further proceedings in any pending residential eviction matter; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
